mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dsm_product(cat_id, product_name, brand_id, shop_id, main_img, product_brief, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{catId}, #{productName}, #{brandId}, #{shopId}, #{mainImage},#{productBrief}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO dsm_product_graphic_detail(product_id, detail_text,create_time, update_time) VALUES(#{productId}, #{detailText}, NOW(), NOW())

INSERT INTO dsm_product_images(product_id, img_url,is_main, create_time) VALUES
(#{bean.productId}, #{bean.imgUrl}, #{bean.isMain}, NOW())

INSERT INTO dsm_product_base_attr(product_id, attr_id, attr_name, value_id, attr_value,create_time, update_time) VALUES
(#{bean.productId}, #{bean.attrId}, #{bean.attrName}, #{bean.valueId}, #{bean.attrValue}, NOW(), NOW())

INSERT INTO dsm_product_custom_attr(product_id, attr_name, attr_value,create_time, update_time) VALUES
(#{bean.productId}, #{bean.attrName}, #{bean.attrValue}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT product_id, cat_id, product_sn, product_name, click_count, brand_id, shop_id, shop_name min_price, max_price, shop_price, warn_number,product_brief, main_img, product_grade, product_status, is_best, is_new, is_hot FROM vdsm_user_product_base WHERE product_id=#{productId} AND product_status=1

SELECT product_id, cat_id, product_sn, product_name, click_count, brand_id, shop_id, a.shop_name, price_min, price_max, shop_price, warn_number,product_brief, main_img, product_grade, product_status, is_best, is_new, is_hot FROM dsm_product WHERE catId=#{productId} AND status=1

select.if: SELECT a.product_id, a.cat_id, a.product_sn, a.product_name, a.click_count, a.brand_id, a.shop_id, a.shop_name, a.min_price, a.max_price, a.shop_price, a.warn_number, a.product_brief, a.main_img, a.product_grade, a.product_status, a.is_best, a.is_new, a.is_hot FROM vdsm_user_product_base a, ( SELECT product_id, fn_calculateSearchWeight(click_count,is_hot,is_new,is_best,0,#{queryWeight[0]}, #{queryWeight[1]},#{queryWeight[2]},#{queryWeight[3]},#{queryWeight[4]}) weightValue FROM vdsm_user_product_base WHERE vdsm_user_product_base.product_status=1 AND FIND_IN_SET(cat_id,fn_getChildCatList(#{catId})) ORDER BY weightValue DESC LIMIT 0,#{totalNum} ) b WHERE a.product_id=b.product_id ORDER BY b.weightValue DESC ;

SELECT a.product_id, a.cat_id, a.product_sn, a.product_name, a.click_count, a.brand_id, a.shop_id, a.shop_name, a.min_price, a.max_price, a.shop_price, a.warn_number, a.product_brief, a.main_img, a.product_grade, a.product_status, a.is_best, a.is_new, a.is_hot FROM vdsm_user_product_base a, ( SELECT product_id, fn_calculateSearchWeight(click_count,is_hot,is_new,is_best,0,#{queryWeight[0]}, #{queryWeight[1]},#{queryWeight[2]},#{queryWeight[3]},#{queryWeight[4]}) weightValue FROM vdsm_user_product_base WHERE vdsm_user_product_base.product_status=1 AND FIND_IN_SET(cat_id,fn_getChildCatList(#{catId})) ORDER BY weightValue DESC LIMIT #{start},#{offset} ) b WHERE a.product_id=b.product_id ORDER BY b.weightValue DESC ;

SELECT a.product_id, a.cat_id, a.product_sn, a.product_name, a.click_count, a.brand_id, a.shop_id, a.shop_name, a.min_price, a.max_price, a.shop_price, a.warn_number, a.product_brief, a.main_img, a.product_grade, a.product_status, a.is_best, a.is_new, a.is_hot FROM vdsm_user_product_base a, ( SELECT product_id FROM vdsm_user_product_base WHERE product_status=1 AND FIND_IN_SET(cat_id,fn_getChildCatList(#{catId})) ORDER BY
min_price
max_price DESC
LIMIT #{start}, #{offset} ) b WHERE a.product_id=b.product_id ORDER BY
min_price
max_price DESC

SELECT a.product_id, a.cat_id, a.product_sn, a.product_name, a.click_count, a.brand_id, a.shop_id, a.shop_name, a.min_price, a.max_price, a.shop_price, a.warn_number, a.product_brief, a.main_img, a.product_grade, a.product_status, a.is_best, a.is_new, a.is_hot FROM vdsm_user_product_base a, ( SELECT vdsm_user_product_base.product_id,
vdsm_user_product_base.min_price min_price
vdsm_user_product_base.min_price max_price max_price
FROM ( SELECT a.product_id FROM ( SELECT product_id FROM dsm_product WHERE dsm_product.product_status=1 AND FIND_IN_SET(cat_id,fn_getChildCatList(#{catId})) UNION ALL SELECT product_id FROM dsm_product_base_attr WHERE STATUS=1 GROUP BY product_id
FIND_IN_SET(#{bean.valueId},GROUP_CONCAT(value_id))
) a GROUP BY a.product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ) p LEFT OUTER JOIN vdsm_user_product_base ON p.product_id=vdsm_user_product_base.product_id WHERE vdsm_user_product_base.product_status=1 ORDER BY
min_price
max_price DESC
LIMIT #{start}, #{offset} ) b WHERE a.product_id=b.product_id ORDER BY
min_price
max_price DESC

mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.cat_id, p.product_sn, p.product_name, p.click_count, p.brand_id, p.shop_id, p.shop_name,p.main_img, p.min_price, p.max_price, p.shop_price, p.warn_number,p.product_brief, p.main_img, p.product_grade, p.product_status, p.is_best, p.is_new, p.is_hot,d.detail_text, p.update_time,p.create_time FROM vdsm_user_product_base p LEFT JOIN dsm_product_graphic_detail d ON p.product_id=d.product_id WHERE p.product_id=#{productId} AND p.product_status=1;
SELECT baseAttr_id, product_id, attr_id, attr_name, value_id, attr_value,sort_order,create_time,update_time FROM dsm_product_base_attr WHERE product_id=#{productId} AND status=1;
SELECT customAttr_id, product_id, attr_name, attr_value,sort_order,create_time,update_time FROM dsm_product_custom_attr WHERE product_id=#{productId} AND status=1
